mapper.select: SELECT sibe.id, sibe.qty, sibe.prod_code, sibe.prod_name, sibe.invoice_rate, sibe.invoice_qty, coq.prod_spec_type, cb.contract_name, cb.contract_number, cb.contract_tax_rate, coq.contract_price, coq.contract_price_tax, coq.contract_amount, coq.contract_amount_tax, coq.contract_amount_tax - coq.contract_amount as contract_tax, cb.contract_tax_rate as tax_rate, ppad.id, ppad.bill_detail_id, ppad.qty, ppad.invoice_tax, ppad.invoice_rate FROM purchase_pay_invoice_detail ppad inner join stk_io_bill_entry sibe on ppad.bill_detail_id = sibe.id inner join contract_object_qty coq on sibe.order_detail_id = coq.id inner join contract_base cb on coq.contract_id = cb.id WHERE ppad.invoice_id = #{id} and ppad.del_flag = '0'

SELECT ppi.invoice_type, ppi.invoice_tax, ppi.invoice_amount, ppi.invoice_amount_tax, ppi.invoice_date FROM purchase_pay_inovice ppi WHERE ppi.del_flag = '0' and ppi.status = '1' and ppi.contract_id = #{id}

select ppi.* from purchase_pay_inovice ppi where ppi.del_flag = '0' and ppi.status > 0
AND ppi.invoice_no LIKE concat(concat('%',#{query.invoiceNo}),'%')
AND ppi.invoice_date = #{query.invoiceDate}
AND ppi.supplier_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{query.supplierName}),'%')
AND ppi.project_id in
#{item}
order by ppi.invoice_no
order by ppi.project_name
order by ppi.supplier_name
order by ppi.invoice_type
order by ppi.currency
order by ppi.invoice_amount
order by ppi.invoice_amount_tax
order by ppi.invoice_date
order by ppi.tax_rate
order by ppi.create_time
asc
desc

SELECT sum(invoice_amount_tax_local) as invoice_amount_tax_local FROM purchase_pay_inovice ppi where ppi.del_flag = '0'
and ppi.project_id = #{query.projectId}

SELECT sum( ppid.contract_amount_tax_local ) AS invoice_amount_tax_local, ppi.project_id as proj_id, bm.model FROM purchase_pay_invoice_detail ppid INNER JOIN purchase_pay_inovice ppi ON ppid.invoice_id = ppi.id INNER JOIN contract_object_qty coq ON ppid.bill_detail_id = coq.id INNER JOIN bas_material bm ON coq.prod_code = bm.`code` WHERE ppid.del_flag = '0' and ppi.project_id = #{query.projectId} GROUP BY ppi.project_id, bm.model

SELECT sum( ppid.contract_amount_tax_local ) AS invoice_amount_tax_local, cb.project_id, cb.category_id FROM purchase_pay_invoice_detail ppid INNER JOIN purchase_pay_inovice ppi ON ppid.invoice_id = ppi.id INNER JOIN contract_base cb on ppi.contract_id = cb.id WHERE ppid.del_flag = '0' and cb.project_id = #{query.projectId} GROUP BY cb.project_id, cb.category_id

select ppi.*, cb.contract_number from purchase_pay_inovice ppi left join contract_base cb on ppi.contract_id = cb.id where ppi.del_flag = '0' and ppi.status > 0
AND cb.contract_first_party_id in
#{item}
AND ppi.invoice_no LIKE concat(concat('%',#{query.invoiceNo}),'%')
AND ppi.invoice_date = #{query.invoiceDate}
AND ppi.supplier_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{query.supplierName}),'%')
AND ppi.project_id in
#{item}
AND ppi.contract_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{query.contractName}),'%')
AND cb.contract_number LIKE concat(concat('%',#{query.contractNumber}),'%')
order by ppi.invoice_no
order by ppi.project_name
order by cb.contract_name
order by cb.contract_number
order by ppi.supplier_name
order by ppi.invoice_type
order by ppi.currency
order by ppi.invoice_amount
order by ppi.invoice_amount_tax
order by ppi.invoice_date
order by ppi.tax_rate
order by ppi.create_time
asc
desc
